title: Lagging and Frame skips after patching.
body: Through the whole game my ping and my frames are completely fine according to the client but I get constant frame skips where i think i am dodging but instead i didn't move at all. it feels like what i am clicking is responding .5 to a second later. I have constant 55 ping which is standard and 120 frames as i have it capped and both rarely fluctuate, but constantly through the game it feels like im lagging. Was playing yesterday fine but today after patching feels trash.

replies.body: Let's go ahead and test your clients connection to the Server first. You can do that by running through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), but make sure you run through all of the steps. If your Ping is still unstable even after that  you can message me back here and we'll help you out.
Getting same problem. Makes playing riven near impossible as it will skip during q's and they end up going in weird directions etc. Very annoying and only since patch. Stable 49 ping and 90+ fps
I have the same problem.. i even have 55 ping lol
